Now in its sixth consecutive year as the definitive graduate employer branding award in the Asia-Pacific region, GCA recorded an impressive 464,220 accumulative votes from university students nationwide—a record-breaking level of participation since its inception. The credibility of the results is underscored by a meticulous verification process conducted by Board of Audit Committees, comprised of 21 professionals hailing from both public and private universities.

title: Public Bank fixing to extend bullish movement, says RHB Retail Research
summary: RHB Retail Research said Public Bank is aiming to extend its bullish movement after breaking past a key resistance.
content:
KUALA LUMPUR (Feb 5): RHB Retail Research said Public Bank is aiming to extend its bullish movement after breaking past a key resistance.

In a trading stocks note on Monday, the research house said that the stock is trading at a multi-month high after it broke past the RM4.40 resistance.

It said the 21-day simple moving average line is pointing upwards, showing that the short-term trend is bullish.

summary: Australian rare earth miner Lynas Rare Earths said that it has held confidential discussions with MP Materials Corp regarding a potential transaction, even as these discussions are not ongoing.
